pages.text: Kujdanowiaspis is antinolepid arthrodiran placoderm known from the Early Devonian of Europe. It had medium to large-sized spines on side, and sharply humped back. As an early form of arthrodiran placodrm, it had a relatively flat body and it was probably benthic.
